## Interactive Examples

```python
# If execute.eval is true, this code will run
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Create visualization
x = np.linspace(0, 2*np.pi, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

plt.figure(figsize=(10, 5))
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title('Sine Wave')
plt.xlabel('x')
plt.ylabel('sin(x)')
plt.grid(True, alpha=0.3)
plt.show()
```
